# callCapability

**Instance Property**

The audio and video capabilities of the call.

## Declaration

```swift
var callCapability: INCallCapability { get }
```

## Getting the Call Details

- **callRecordType**: The type of call that resulted from the attempt.
- **INCallCapability**: Constants indicating the capabilities of the call.
- **dateCreated**: The date and time at which the call was initiated.
- **callDuration**: The duration (measured in seconds) of the call.
- **unseen**: A Boolean value indicating whether the user has seen the call.
- **numberOfCalls**: The number of calls in the call record.
- **participants**: The recipient of the user’s call request.
